title: Pirata & Capitano
overview: Pirata, our heroine and co-star is a pirate girl, captain of her own ship, the Pink Skull, traveling the Great Sea, in search of adventure, with her inseparable Capitano, a child who drives a red seaplane, who loves flying but hates water. A series full of humor and adventure in search of the greatest treasures we can imagine: the values that children should have.
